email_body: is there a password or just knowing the address ---------------------- Forwarded by John Arnold/HOU/ECT on 05/08/2001 05:08 PM --------------------------- From: Alex Mcleish/ENRON@enronXgate on 05/08/2001 10:40 AM To: John Arnold/HOU/ECT@ECT cc: Subject: gas message board access John, is access to the board on a password basis now? If so, when you get a chance could you authorise access for myself and Andew Hill (a colleague in crude fundamentals) please? A similar board for crude and products should be ready within a couple of weeks. Thanks Alex
